story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0200:
I must say, I’m impressed. It took much longer than
anticipated to wear you down.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0300:
Even in that form, Hoopa performed beyond my
expectations.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0400:
It uses its ability to warp space and call humans
and Pokémon to a place of its liking...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0500: How very useful for my schemes.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0700:
We did it, boss! Pasio has finally fallen into the
hands of Team Rocket!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0800:
I wonder... Just because we’ve taken down its
owner doesn’t mean the job is complete.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_0900:
There are still many sync pairs on Pasio with
hope in their eyes.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1100: Well, well. You’ve finally made it this far.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1200: You must be extremely talented sync pairs.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1300: I’ll take care of that executive, Silver. So you...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1500: Hey, you! I’ll take you on!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1600:
I’ll make sure you’re punished for what you’ve
done... Just like that time at the radio tower!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1700:
*sigh* Even at a time like this, you still insist on
taking the high road and having a one-on-one
battle with me?
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_1800:
You obviously have no idea who you’re
dealing with.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2100: We may all be fighting our own battles...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2200:
but our hearts will always be together! Don’t
worry—we can win!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2500:
You still insist on battling on your own, in a
situation like this?
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2600: I’ll never be like you. I’ll surpass you!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2700: Fine. Then I’ll take you on.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_2800:
I’ll teach you a lesson about just how cruel the
world can be. That’s my job, as an adult.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3200:
In the end, you had to rely on your little friend to
save you. You can’t do anything on your own.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3400:
Sorry, Silver... I really was gonna stand
back, but...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3500:
We also have to make sure we win, for the
people of Pasio...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3700:
I would’ve lost if you weren’t here. Same goes
for everyone else.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3800: Without you all, I couldn’t have gotten this far.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_3900:
That’s the truth, and I have to accept that as
the limit of what I can do.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4300:
You’re right. As I am now, I still can’t beat you on
my own.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4400:
But we can’t afford to lose, because the people
of Pasio need us to win.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4500: So really, this isn’t just my battle...
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4600:
This is a battle to take down Team Rocket once
and for all!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4700:
I’m only letting this happen once. Next time, I’ll
definitely beat you on my own!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4800: Your eyes finally have the look of an adult.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_4900:
Let’s do this, Ethan. The two of us can take
him down!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_5000: Yeah! There’s no way we’ll lose if we’re together!
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_5100:
Well, then. Perhaps I should get a little more
serious about this, too.
story_teamrocket_03_06000/2401_1001_5200:
Witness this power! It is the power I possess as
the leader of Team Rocket!
